title: Add Submit Your Review section with form and confirmation

requirements.summary: Create SubmitReview component with bilingual section header and subtitle
acceptanceCriteria: Component renders section header and subtitle
Text content switches between English and Bengali using LanguageContext
Styling matches existing brand theme (gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accents)

file_operations.description: Create new SubmitReview component with section header 'Share Your Experience!' and subtitle 'We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.' Support bilingual content using useLanguage hook from LanguageContext. Apply brand styling with gold/yellow text on dark background with maroon accents matching existing components.

requirements.summary: Implement review submission form with required and optional fields
acceptanceCriteria: All five form fields render with correct input types
Required fields (Full Name, Class/Year, Review) display validation on submission
Star rating uses interactive star icons (1-5) that highlight on hover and click

file_operations.description: Add form with five fields: Full Name (required text input), Class/Year (required text input), Subject(s) Studied (optional text input), Your Review (required textarea), and Rating (optional 1-5 star selector). Implement interactive star rating with hover and click states using star icons. Add validation for required fields. Use bilingual labels via LanguageContext. Ensure mobile-friendly design with large touch targets for accessibility.

requirements.summary: Add Submit Review button with validation and success toast notification
acceptanceCriteria: Submit button validates Full Name, Class/Year, and Review fields before submission
Success toast displays with confirmation message after submission

file_operations.description: Add Submit Review button that validates required fields (Full Name, Class/Year, Review) before submission. Call backend submitReview method with form data. Display success toast with message 'Thank you for your review! Your feedback helps us improve and inspire other students.' using existing Toaster component. Clear form after successful submission. Use bilingual button text via LanguageContext. Handle submission errors with appropriate error messages.

requirements.summary: Style SubmitReview component with clean card layout and mobile-responsive design
acceptanceCriteria: Component uses Card component from shadcn/ui or similar styling
Form fields have adequate spacing and padding
Styling matches existing brand theme (gold/yellow, dark background, maroon accents)

file_operations.description: Apply clean card layout using Card component with borders or subtle shadow. Ensure consistent spacing and padding for form fields. Implement mobile-first responsive design that works across all screen sizes. Add hover effects matching existing components like AdmissionForm and Contact. Use brand colors (gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accents) consistently with the rest of the application.

requirements.summary: Integrate SubmitReview component into App.tsx between Gallery and AdmissionForm sections
acceptanceCriteria: SubmitReview component renders in correct position in page flow
No layout breaks or styling conflicts with adjacent sections

file_operations.description: Import and render SubmitReview component after Gallery section and before AdmissionForm section. Component automatically inherits LanguageProvider context from existing wrapper. Verify no layout conflicts with adjacent sections and maintain consistent page flow.
